title: Ticket #4770: DAG config file does not affect condor_submit_dag behavior
description:
A user just ran into the following problem: they have a per-DAG config file in which they specify a DAGMAN_INSERT_SUB_FILE setting -- but that ends up not taking effect. (If you set the environment variable _CONDOR_DAGMAN_INSERT_SUB_FILE, or specify -insert_sub_file on the command line, it does work.)

I think that the per-DAG config file should affect the behavior of condor_submit_dag, to be consistent with setting DAGMAN_INSERT_SUB_FILE (or other config knobs) in the overall config settings or in the user's environment.
